name: Christmas Gifts Shopping Game
description:
Prepare yourself for Christmas Gifts Shopping Game adventure, featuring cashier girl performing Christmas shopping in beautifully designed colorful toy shop or fee shopping Centre. This shopping super mall game provides you the opportunity to move through different shops from engaging Christmas games in superstore or colorful supermarket of NY city. Christmas Gifts Shopping Game allows you to become cashier from cashier games of the highly advanced cash register and successfully handle various.


Christmas Gifts Shopping Game engages in beautiful colorful toy shop or fee shopping Centre where you will do Christmas shopping in various colorful shops from Christmas games having various Christmas gift items including Santa Christmas toys, or gadgets along with Christmas coloring book gifts from toy shop of superstore

Features:

- Highly colorful HD graphics with beautiful superstore environment.
- Top notch sounds & effects from Christmas games.
- Highly thrilling shopping simulation to make shopping fun.
- Highly addictive kids game based play mode.
- Multiple shopping mall payment collection methods like cash, credit card or NFC & more.
